column2: How effective is your organization’s current sustainability program in managing emerging technologies?
column3: Which area of sustainability do you think needs the most improvement in your organization?
column4: How well does your organization incorporate sustainable practices in the lifecycle management of emerging technologies?
column5: What is the biggest challenge in implementing sustainable practices in emerging technologies at your organization?
column6: How often does your organization review and update its sustainability practices concerning emerging technologies?
column7: To what extent does your organization invest in sustainable technologies?
column8: How satisfied are you with the training provided on sustainable practices related to emerging technologies?
column9: How well do you think your organization's sustainability efforts are communicated to employees?
column10: Which sustainable technology has had the most positive impact on your organization?
column11: How effective are your organization’s policies in reducing electronic waste?
column12: How important is sustainability in your organization’s strategy for adopting new technologies?
column13: What is your organization’s primary motivation for adopting sustainable practices in managing emerging technologies?
